m_szDocTitle: Second Year on Inc. 5000 - FATHOM // 3D Printer Sales, Advanced Prototype Fabrication, Bridge-To-Production Low Volume Manufacturing
m_szDocSumamry: FATHOM // 3D Printer Sales, Advanced Prototype Fabrication, Bridge-To-Production Low Volume Manufacturing FATHOM Celebrates Second Year on Inc. Magazine’s Annual List of America’s Fastest-Growing Private Companies 3D Printing Expert Hosts Giveaway in Celebration of Ranking #1312 on the Inc. 5000 Inc. Magazine this month ranked FATHOM, an advanced technology driven company with an expertise in 3D printing and additive manufacturing, NO. 1312 on its 33rd annual Inc. 5000, an exclusive ranking of the nation’s fastest-growing private companies in America [ source ].
